About.paragraph1: A Mind Map is an easy way to brainstorm thoughts organically without worrying about order and structure. It allows you to visually structure your ideas to help with analysis and recall.
About.paragraph2: A tool to representing tasks, words, concepts, or items linked to visually and arranged around a central concept or subject using a non-linear graphical layout that allows the user to build an intuitive framework around a central concept. A Mind Map can turn a long list of monotonous information into a colorful, memorable and highly organized diagram that works in line with your brain's natural way of doing things.

Features.title: Login/Register
Features.text: Start creating your own mind-maps by registering & login to your account

Features.title: Visualize Your ideas
Features.text: A visualization diagram tool that allows you to explore a central idea, and all of its related topic.

Features.title: Modification of Mappings
Features.text: Provides a way to reorganize and re-link the ideas in a graphical way to represent around a certain concept.

Features.title: JWT Authentication
Features.text: A token-based stateless authentication mechanism and are digitally signed using HMAC + SHA256.
